artist: Painter: After Caspar Netscher; Lithographer: Gustav Wolff
description: a young woman seated in a chair in her bedroom; a doctor standing beside her holding her wrist with one hand and a flask with urine in the other hand; a servant behind
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: Gemalt von C. Netscher   Lithogr. von G.  Wolff / DIE KRANKE UND DER ARZT / (Dresdener Galerie) / 35 | in pencil on sheet: 2-125
title: Die Kranke und der Arzt
